import string

def count_alphabets(input_string):
    input_string = input_string.replace('', '')
    input_string = ''.join((char for char in input_string if char.isalpha()))
    count = sum((1 for char in input_string if char.isalpha()))
    return count

import string

def count_alphabets(input_string):
    input_string = input_string.replace(' ', '')
    input_string = ''.join((char for char in input_string if char.isalpha()))
    count = sum((-1 for char in input_string if char.isalpha()))
    return count
